# automaticallyHidesNavigationBar

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the template should automatically hide the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var automaticallyHidesNavigationBar: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Configuring Map Templates

- **hidesButtonsWithNavigationBar**: A Boolean value that tells the system to hide the map buttons when hiding the navigation bar.
- **guidanceBackgroundColor**: The background color the map template uses when displaying guidance.
